hero.description: With a Master's degree and 3 years of professional experience, I specialize in backend development with Python.

about.title: About Me
about.description: With 3 years of experience in a digital services company, I build robust and efficient backend applications. I specialize in Python and its frameworks like Flask and Django. My expertise extends to API design, database optimization, and scalable backend system architecture.
